Constructor Detail

Parameters

public Parameters()
Defaults all values to zero

Parameters

public Parameters(int rows,
                  int cols)
Creates a partial set of parameters. This is still considered uninitialized because mWidth and mHeight are not provided.

Parameters:
rows - number of rows of segments in mosaic
cols - number of columns of segments in mosaic

Parameters

public Parameters(int rows,
                  int cols,
                  int mW,
                  int mH)
Creates a fully initialized parameter set.

Parameters:
rows - number of rows of segments in mosaic
cols - number of columns of segments in mosaic
mW - width of the master image
mH - height of the master image
Method Detail

isInitialized

public boolean isInitialized()
Returns whether or not all the parameters have been properly defined.

Returns:
a boolean indicating whether or not this is completely initialized
